game.name: Baby Barbie cooking Cotton Candy
game.description:
Baby Barbie Cooking Cotton Candy is an awesome brand new kitchen game for girls and boys. You will have to use your unmatched chef skills to make your victory in this best free online game. Accept this unique cooking challenge and prepare some extremely scrumptious treats within the shortest possible time. Make sure that you will select the best shapes and colors for your favourite dessert. Try your hands in your real kitchen to surprise your friends and family after playing it in a virtual world.

Baby Barbie is planning something big today ladies! Let play together and become a part of this real fun. She has already invited her few close friends to attend the party. In order to make them surprise, she wants to prepare some mouth-watering homemade cotton candy. Hope you would assist her to cook the best dessert for her friends. Your helping hand will definitely work as a key to win this cool princess cooking game for girls and boys. 

The princess is trying this recipe for the first time, so she is quite confused how to complete her mission. Start this brand new kitchen game with shopping some needful ingredients. Return the home and mix all the useful ingredients in a proper ratio to prepare a super delicious piece of cotton candy. Choose the nice shapes and colors for them to impress all Baby Barbie friends. Pay attention to the details to create the tasty dessert.
